name: CAPY-VIRUS
description:
Press [E] to progress through the intro cut scene.

---

Capy-VIRUS involves the tale of an innocent Capybara who is empowered with the biggest responsibilities of them all... Protect the planet and protect yourself.

---

Controls

WASD / Arrow Keys = Movement

E / Space = Interact

----

Made using...

  • Godot Game Engine
  • Dialogic plugin for Godot
  • Aseprite
  • Zrythm DAW
  • Vial/Vital Virtual Instrument

----

Known issues:

The intro cutscene gets infected too!

Intro text:

A long time ago on a familiar blue planet two friends were walking when they were startled by an Earthquake! from the ground rose a stone giant, who bellowed...  "I was the protector of this planet, little ones. I have seen mountains rise and oceans form... and I have seen great destruction." "But I have become tired. I bestow upon you my power. friend. You must grow to meet this responsibility." The capybara grew, and became protector on the land. Many centuries later, a virus fell to Earth and began to infect all that it could. The capybara lay down his life to protect the inhabitants of the land. He provided shelter for all life, in order to save them from the virus. The capybara's soul became weak but resisted the virus. The soul began its journey through the eyes... the window to the soul. The soul found antibodies fighting for their host. This would not be easy, but all was not lost. All was not lost.
